task.title: Fix duplicate up startup failure and broker lock diagnostics

events.content: Prevent duplicate up from clobbering broker.pid and hide lock cause: Prevent duplicate up from clobbering broker.pid and hide lock cause

raw.question: Prevent duplicate up from clobbering broker.pid and hide lock cause
raw.chosen: Prevent duplicate up from clobbering broker.pid and hide lock cause
raw.reasoning: A second up was overwriting or deleting pid state and surfacing only code=1; preflight checks plus stderr context make failure deterministic and actionable

retrospective.summary: Improved up startup diagnostics and duplicate-run protection; broker lock failures now surface root cause; validated with tests and live repro
